Literature.Title: Antimicrobial Peptides for Topical Treatment of Osteomyelitis and Implant-Related Infections: Study in the Spongy Bone.
Literature.Author: Melicherčík P, Nesuta O, Cerovský V

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=10µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=8-10µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis(MIC=2.2µM),Enterococcus faecalis(MIC=50.7µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=4µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=10.7µM),Candida albicans F7-39/IDE99(MIC=16µM)
